ai-kv1.9:1.3_0: ‘All these things are rightly developed by mindfulness of the body, the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity. It is the recollection of the Buddha. The teaching is developed that it is the recollection of the teaching. Regardless of the teaching, the the the Dhamma that is opposite of the body, and the recollection of peace. Rebirth, the teaching, the Saṅgha, and the ethics loved by the noble ones. And they will go back to non-returnment of the body, and the teaching.
ai-kv1.9:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.

ai-kv1.9:2.7_1: Their sense fields are unprofitable. They shall recollection of the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha. Mindfulness of breathing, mindfulness of breathing, and recollection of death.

ai-kv1.9:5.2_0: “All things are found in the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.”
ai-kv1.9:5.4_0: When this isn’t there is no idiot in fact.
ai-kv1.9:5.6_0: Yet when there is, there are still because of that,
ai-kv1.9:5.7_0: “All things are found in the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.”
ai-kv1.9:6.1_0: Their mindfulness does not exist. All things are all found.
ai-kv1.9:6.3_0: Their contact contemplates all conditions: all contact in the places of contact.
ai-kv1.9:6.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.

ai-kv1.9:8.3_0: having mindfulness established and he is mindful,
ai-kv1.9:8.4_0: for all sentient beings, which is established and held back.

ai-kv1.9:9.4_0: “Mendicants, those who enjoy mindfulness of the body haven’t enjoyed the deathless.
ai-kv1.9:9.5_0: Those who enjoy mindfulness of the body enjoy the deathless.”
ai-kv1.9:9.8_0: All sentient beings enjoy mindfulness of the body, and make much of them.
ai-kv1.9:9.9_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv1.9:10.4_0: “Mendicants, the four kinds of mindfulness meditation are the path to convergence. They are in order to purify sentient beings, to get past sorrow and crying, to make an end of pain and sadness, to end the cycle of suffering, and to realize extinguishment.”
ai-kv1.9:10.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv1.9:11.4_0: “Mendicants, the manifestation of the wheel-turning monarch appeared to the seven treasures of a wheel-turning monarch.
ai-kv1.9:11.6_0: When the elephant-treasure appears to the wheel-turning monarch.
ai-kv1.9:11.11_0: When a Wheel-Turning Monarch appears these seven treasures appear.
ai-kv1.9:12.1_0: When a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha appears the seven treasures of the awakening factors appear.
ai-kv1.9:12.3_0: The treasures of the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
ai-kv1.9:12.4_0: When a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha appears the seven treasures of the awakening factors appear.”
ai-kv1.9:12.7_0: When a Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha has appeared all things.
ai-kv1.9:12.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv1.9:12.16_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv1.9:12.17_0: The discussion on mindfulness meditation is finished.
